name: Da Source...!
subtitle: We're so back
description: A repository of apps Charles uses when he feels like updating them.

apps.name: Instagram
apps.subtitle: ceo of doomscrolling
apps.localizedDescription: I just use this app for dming ppl tbh.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This allows your phone to find and connect to the glasses using a Bluetooth connection.
privacy.NSFocusStatusUsageDescription: This allows Instagram to check to see if you’ve been missing notifications from friends. You can always change this later in settings.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Instagram uses your device's camera to do things like help you take photos, record videos and use effects.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This helps Instagram personalize ads we show you.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save photos and videos to your Camera Roll.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Used to discover and connect to compatible streaming devices on your Wi-Fi network.
privacy.NSLocationUsageDescription: Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content and help people find places. You can change your preferences at any time in your device settings.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This will let Instagram sync events to your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Instagram uses your device's microphone to do things like help you record videos and preview audio effects.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content and help people find places. You can change your preferences at any time in your device settings.
privacy.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This will let Instagram sync events to your calendar.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Enable Face ID for quick and secure authentication on Instagram.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content and help people find places. You can change your preferences at any time in your device settings.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Instagram will use your contacts to suggest people and things you care about, and offer a better service. Your contacts will be periodically synced and securely stored on Instagram’s servers.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Instagram uses access to your camera roll to do things like help you share photos and videos to Instagram, apply effects and suggest photos and videos to share.

apps.name: Facebook
apps.subtitle: unc ass app
apps.localizedDescription: Time to fall into the alt-right pipeline through AI generated reels.

privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Enable Face ID for quick and secure authentication on Facebook.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allowing access to your address book helps you see the contacts you can choose to add and helps us provide a better service.
privacy.NSSiriUsageDescription: This will let Siri help you look for photos on Facebook
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Facebook uses access to your photos to do things like help you share and apply visual effects to your photos and videos, and to suggest photos and videos to share.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Facebook will use speech recognition to detect your confirmation.
privacy.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: This will let Facebook sync events you're hosting or attending to your calendar.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This helps Facebook personalize ads we show you.
privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Facebook uses Bluetooth so you can do things like find and connect to devices and cast videos to TV.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Facebook uses access to your photos to do things like help you save images to your device, share and apply visual effects to your photos and videos, and to suggest photos and videos to share.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription:
Facebook uses access to your camera to do things like help you take and share photos, record videos, and use visual effects.

You can always change this in your device settings.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription:
Facebook uses access to your microphone to do things like help you record audio, identify songs, search with your voice and use audio effects.

You can always change this in your device settings.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Facebook uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences, like helping you check-in, find local events and get better ads.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Facebook uses access to your media library to do things like help you play music and other audio from your device, and to save audio to your device.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Facebook uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Facebook uses Bluetooth so you can do things like find and connect to devices and cast videos to TV.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This will let Facebook sync events you're hosting or attending to your calendar.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Facebook uses your local network so you can do things like find and connect to devices and cast videos to TV.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Facebook uses this to provide more relevant and personalized experiences, like helping you check-in, find local events and get better ads.

apps.name: Twitch
apps.subtitle: hot tub stream app
apps.localizedDescription: Streamers really think they're A-list celebrities on this stupid platform for NERDS.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Twitch needs permission to access the camera on this device to stream live video and change your profile image.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your iOS advertising ID and device data will be used to support creators and provide a personal ad experience.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Twitch needs permission to write to your photo library in order to save images.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Twitch uses the local network to discover Cast-enabled devices on your WiFi network.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Twitch needs permission to access the microphone on this device to stream live video.

apps.name: YouTube
apps.subtitle: #1 time waster app
apps.localizedDescription: Modified IPA so you can only watch Outdoor Boys.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This enables local content discovery, improved recommendations, and enhanced search results.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.
